titles.title: A resolution condemning any attempts by Russia to claim sovereignty over any portion of Ukraine.
A resolution condemning any attempts by Russia to claim sovereignty over any portion of Ukraine.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the refusal of the Senate to recognize any Russian claim of sovereignty over any portion of Ukraine and calls on the President to restrict economic and military aid and assistance to any country that recognizes Russian sovereignty over any part of Ukraine.
